gw.api.restriction

Class UnionRestrictionBuilder<A extends KeyableBean>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.restriction.RestrictionBuilder<A>
      • gw.api.restriction.UnionRestrictionBuilder<A>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - Root type for the Restrictions. Must be an entity type.

    public final class UnionRestrictionBuilder<A extends KeyableBean>
extends RestrictionBuilder<A>
    Builder for composing Restrictions, each of which has owning type <A>. The restrictions will be composed using union (query) / or (predicate) logic. Restrictions filter queries together with in-memory collections.

        Filters out rows for which the PersistentPath evaluates to a leaf value in or not in the in list depending on inOp.
        Specified by:
        compareSet in class RestrictionBuilder<A extends KeyableBean>
        Type Parameters:
        B - Type of the leaf value. Must be comparable.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to traverse during filtering.
        inOp - In operation for filtering.
        values - In list for filtering.
        Returns:
        This builder.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if path, inOp or values are null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if values contains MonetaryAmounts of mismatched currencies.
